## What is ggplot2?

{ggplot2} is a system for creating elegant graphics based on The Grammar of Graphics.

## What is new?

ggplot 3.4.0 has been released. Install it with:

```r
install.packages("ggplot2")
```

### Better error messages

```{r}
#| error: true
#| message: false

library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

mtcars %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = cyl, y = hp)) +
  geom_bar()
```
